content.raw:
It does mean "greater than 2.82" ([see SearchForStuff logic](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/1e71620459fa392ec1ec6a30df84d75e0086615d/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake?at=default#cl-440)). I would have preferred `GE_283`, but it was simpler to implement using cmake's `VERSION_GREATER` operator, as there is no `VERSION_GREATER_OR_EQUAL`. I can refactor the search logic if you don't like it.

The code inside the `ifndef` should only execute on 2.82, since it is working around a bug that was fixed in 2.83
content.html:
It does mean "greater than 2.82" (see SearchForStuff logic). I would have preferred GE_283, but it was simpler to implement using cmake's VERSION_GREATER operator, as there is no VERSION_GREATER_OR_EQUAL. I can refactor the search logic if you don't like it.

The code inside the ifndef should only execute on 2.82, since it is working around a bug that was fixed in 2.83
